dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
C. Cortes
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of handwritten digits, each 28x28 pixels in size, used for training various machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset consisting of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of fashion items, each 28x28 pixels in size, designed as a drop-in replacement for the MNIST dataset.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class, used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
